comment: * An object representing a request for credential data.

methods.name: public Map<String, Collection<String>> getDeviceSignedEntriesToRequest()
methods.comment:
* Gets the device-signed entries to request.
     *
     * @return the device-signed entries to request.

methods.name: public Map<String, Collection<String>> getIssuerSignedEntriesToRequest()
methods.comment:
* Gets the issuer-signed entries to request.
     *
     * @return the issuer-signed entries to request.

methods.name: public boolean isAllowUsingExhaustedKeys()
methods.comment:
* Gets whether to allow using an authentication key which use count has been exceeded. * *

By default this is set to true. * * @return whether to allow using an authentication key which use * count has been exceeded if no other key is available.

methods.name: public boolean isAllowUsingExpiredKeys()
methods.comment:
* Gets whether to allow using an authentication key which is expired. * *

By default this is set to false. * * @return whether to allow using an authentication key which is * expired if no other key is available.

methods.name: public boolean isIncrementUseCount()
methods.comment:
* Gets whether to increment the use-count for the authentication key used. * *

By default this is set to true. * * @return whether to increment the use count of the authentication key used.

methods.name: public byte[] getRequestMessage()
methods.comment:
* Gets the request message CBOR. * *

This data structure is described in the documentation for the * {@link PresentationSession#getCredentialData(String, CredentialDataRequest)} method. * * @return the request message CBOR as described above.

methods.name: public byte[] getReaderSignature()
methods.comment:
* Gets the reader signature. * *

This data structure is described in the documentation for the * {@link PresentationSession#getCredentialData(String, CredentialDataRequest)} method. * * @return a {@code COSE_Sign1} structure as described above.
